Minecraft School of Witchcraft and Wizardry was last updated on May 19th, 2020 and is available for download here in version 1.0.

For all muggles and wizards: The free Minecraft mod “Minecraft School of Witchcraft and Wizardy” opens Hogwarts’ doors and has all kinds of exciting quests and co-ops ready.

The dealer may pay a commission for links on this page, eg for links marked with or green underlining. More info.

Minecraft School of Witchcraft and Wizardry After Lord of the Rings fans have been able to wander around the Minecraft Shire for a long time, Harry Potter fans can now also get their hands on the magic wand: The RPG “Minecraft School of Witchcraft and Wizardry” finally fulfills the long-awaited wish from the letter to the 11th birthday and invites Minecraft players into an exciting Harry Potter world.

Minecraft School of Witchcraft and Wizardy: Minecraft Hogwarts as it is written

The massive castle includes the Defense Against the Dark Arts classroom, the dining room with floating candles and of course the Grand Staircase. Of course, magic is not neglected in this Minecraft mod, so the ever-moving Great Staircase promises access to secret rooms and corridors, enemies have to be fought with magic spells and one or the other can be done on the Quidditch field thanks to the co-op function magical match to be played. However, the magic adventure does not end at the gates of Hogwarts, the quests and co-ops also lead the players to Diagon Alley, Hagrid’s Hut, Platform 9 3/4 and even the Chamber of Secrets. In addition to the Butterbeer, the underground labyrinth, Godric’s Hollow and many other magical places should not be missing.

The map and related resources are free to download; However, the prerequisite is the Java version of Minecraft 1.13.2. Unfortunately, players using the Windows Store Edition, Pocket Edition, Xbox, PS3 or PS4 Edition cannot claim the map.
